meta.description: ClassQuiz is a quiz app to learn interactively for students, which is open source and free to use
meta.title: Home

index_page.stats: There are already {{user_count}} users and {{quiz_count}} quizzes on ClassQuiz.
index_page.see_what_true_and_false: See what was right or wrong
index_page.see_how_many_true_and_false: See how many were right or wrong
index_page.create_a_quiz_from_scratch: Create a quiz from scratch with the editor and include pictures and more
index_page.find_or_explore: Find (or explore) quizzes made or imported by other people
index_page.check_if_chosen_wisely: Check, if you have chosen wisely
index_page.get_ranking_and_winners: Get the ranking and see who won
index_page.no_tracking_content: Others track you and sends that info to third-parties, but ClassQuiz doesn't.
index_page.self_hostable_content: ClassQuiz can easily be self-hosted, so the data is only in your control!
index_page.user_friendly_content: ClassQuiz aims to be simple, so it is can be used by everyone.
index_page.completely_free_content: ClassQuiz is completely cost free (for the user), without any paid plans or annoying redirects to the upgrade-page. Donations are highly appreciated.
index_page.quiz_results_downloadable_content: Quiz-results can be easily exported into an Excel-spreadsheet. (Didn't know others couldn't do that)
index_page.multilingual_content: ClassQuiz is available in English, French, German, Italian, Norwegian Bokm√•l, Turkish, and partly Indonesian and Catalan.
index_page.dark_mode_content: One of the most important features a website can have!
index_page.german_server_content: ClassQuiz's servers are located in Germany and hosted by netcup.
index_page.download_quizzes_content: Quizzes can be downloaded as one file and imported at any time. This also lets you move your quizzes to other ClassQuiz instances.
index_page.community_driven_content: ClassQuiz depends on its community for funding, testing ideas, feature requests, translations and more! You can also be a part of the ClassQuiz-community!
index_page.no_player_limit_content: ClassQuiz doesn't have an artificial player limit. In theory, 1000+ players could play the same quiz, but it's tested with up to 300 players per quiz.
index_page.import_quiz_from_kahoot_and_edit: Import quizzes from Kahoot! and edit them in ClassQuiz

overview_page.no_quizzes: Click the "Create"-button, or import a quiz to get going.

login_page.login_or_create_account: Log in or create an account

success.success_check_mail: Logged in. Check your e-mail inbox.

description.success_check_mail: Please check your e-mail inbox for an e-mail with a link you can click to log in.

description.wrong_creds: Please ensure your password and e-mail address are correct.
description.unexpected: There was the good old unexpected error!

editor.abcd_description: Only one answer can be chosen
editor.check_choice_description: All correct answers have to be chosen to score points
editor.order_description: Answers can be brought into the correct order
editor.range_description: A number-range can be selected with a slider

import_page.url_should_look_like_this: The URL should look like this: https://create.kahoot.it/details/...
import_page.side_import_kahoot: On this side you can import quizzes, which live on Kahoot!.
import_page.upload_file_ending: Upload the file ending in .cqa or .xlsx
import_page.this_side_classquiz: On this side you can import quizzes, which were exported from ClassQuiz.
import_page.this_side_classquiz_excel: You can also upload excel files, if you've filled out the following template. If a quiz with the title already exists, it will append the questions to the existing quiz.

admin_page.already_registered_as_admin: There is already an admin registered for this game.
admin_page.start_by_showing_first_question: Start by showing the first question.
admin_page.enter_answer_into_field: Enter your answer into the input field!

play_page.end_sentence: That's it! This was the quiz.
play_page.join_by_entering_code: Join by entering the following code
play_page.answered: You have already provided your answer: {{answer}}

editor_page.right_click_to_delete: Right-click on an answer to delete it!

dashboard.info_analytics: The "Plays" only show how often the quiz was started (you included), whereas the "Views" count how often the "View"-page was visited, so it also counts bots (sorry for that).
dashboard.commandpalette_notice: Press <kbd>Ctr</kbd>+<kbd>k</kbd> or <kbd>Meta</kbd>+<kbd>k</kbd> to open the command palette

footer.self_ads: Made with ‚ù§Ô∏è by {{mawoka_link}} and with the help of {{others_link}}.
footer.donate: If you find this useful, please consider {{donate_link}}.

error_page.404_text: The page you were looking for is gone or never even existed. Who knows?
error_page.unknown_error_text: That shouldn't happen. It's probably my fault, not yours, but maybe you have a magical power to break stuff...

uploader.upload_video_popup_notice: The popup is open; have a look at it for further information
uploader.search_english_only: The search works in English only

general_overview.sentence: The quiz "{{title}}", which was played on {{date}} had {{player_count}} players with an average score of {{average_score}}.

controllers.version_overview: The newest version available is {{newest_version}} and version {{current_version}} is installed.
controllers.already_latest_version: You're already on the latest version

totp_setup.scan_to_set_up: Scan this QR-code to set up the code
totp_setup.enter_as_secret_if_no_see_code: Enter this as the secret if you can't scan the QR-code
totp_setup.do_not_forget_backup_code: Do not forget to save your recovery-code!

start_game.captcha_message: If enabled, Google's ReCaptcha will load in the browser of players. Only enable if you really need it, since you need the consent of EVERY player to load the captcha.
start_game.normal_mode_description: Question and answer will only be shown on admins screen. The players will only have colored buttons with symbols matching these on the screen of the admin.
start_game.old_school_mode_description: Questions and images will be shown on both admins screen and on the screen of the players

public_user_page.no_original_quizzes: This user doesn't have any original quizzes

file_dashboard.caption: Caption: {{caption}}
file_dashboard.storage_usage: You've used {{used}} MiB out of {{total}} MiB of storage. That's equivalent to {{percent}}% of your storage.

downloader.help: The own format (.cqa) also includes pictures and supports every question type, whereas the excel format only supports voting and multiple-choice questions.
